name: The Looming Fog
description:
The Looming Fog is a short visual novel experience.

You find yourself trapped inside an abandoned mental institution. Explore the building and find the means to escape - but there might be more holding you back than meets the eye.

This game has three endings. Can you get them all?

CREDITS:

Concept/Narrative Designer - Maja Bjørnaas Hoem (Titanelie)

Visual - Natis345

Audio - Torje Johannessen

CREATOR'S STATEMENT

Hey there! This visual novel/text-adventure was inspired by and created for the SuNoFes game jam in 2022.

My aim with making this product was to familiarize myself with Twine, as well as further refine my design process. It isn't technically advanced, but I had so much fun making it. Thank you so much to the creator of the jam, and to everyone who tested and helped bring this together!

... And a big thank you to you for visiting this page and playing my game! I am incredibly grateful to you all.

- Titanelie
